name: idg.se dark theme
description: Provides an ergonomic way to read the idg.se site with a nice dark background that doesn't strain your eyes. Theme for people who don't fancy staring for minutes into a light bulb.
additional_info:
Initial version, only tested on the main idg.se front page. IDG sub domains may not display accurately as they haven't been tested. If you run into odd rendering, such as black text on black background, then just tweak the style sheet.

I'll be updating the style sheet as I discover stuff that needs correcting, but am an infrequent user of IDG, so updates may be far between.
